# pencilInteraction(_:didReceiveSqueeze:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when a person squeezes Apple Pencil.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func pencilInteraction(_ interaction: UIPencilInteraction, didReceiveSqueeze squeeze: UIPencilInteraction.Squeeze)
```
